Typealiases.html#/s:6RxFlow04NextB5Items.name: NextFlowItems
Typealiases.html#/s:6RxFlow04NextB5Items.abstract: typealias to allow compliance with older versions of RxFlow. NextFlowItems should be replaced by FlowContributors

Typealiases.html#/s:6RxFlow11Coordinator.name: Coordinator
Typealiases.html#/s:6RxFlow11Coordinator.abstract: typealias to allow compliance with older versions of RxFlow. Coordinator should be replaced by FlowCoordinator

Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.name: steps
Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.abstract: the relay used to emit steps inside this Stepper

Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.name: initialStep
Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.abstract: the initial step that will be emitted when listening to this Stepper

Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.name: readyToEmitSteps()
Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.abstract: function called when stepper is listened by the FlowCoordinator

Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.name: rxVisible
Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.abstract: Rx Observable that triggers a bool indicating if the current Presentable is being displayed

Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.name: rxDismissed
Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.abstract: Rx Observable (Single trait) triggered when this presentable is dismissed

Protocols/Flow.html#/s:6RxFlow0B0P4rootA.name: root
Protocols/Flow.html#/s:6RxFlow0B0P4rootA.abstract: the Presentable on which rely the navigation inside this Flow. This method must always give the same instance

Protocols/Flow.html#/s:6RxFlow0B0P8navig.name: navigate(to:)
Protocols/Flow.html#/s:6RxFlow0B0P8navig.abstract: Resolves FlowContributors according to the Step, in the context of this very Flow

Protocols/Flow.html.name: Flow
Protocols/Flow.html.abstract: A Flow defines a clear navigation area. Combined to a Step it leads to a navigation action

Protocols/Presentable.html.name: Presentable
Protocols/Presentable.html.abstract: An abstraction of what can be presented to the screen. For now, UIViewControllers and Flows are Presentable

Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow4StepP.name: Step
Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow4StepP.abstract: A Step describes a possible state of navigation inside a Flow

Protocols/Stepper.html.name: Stepper
Protocols/Stepper.html.abstract: a Stepper has only one purpose is: emits Steps that correspond to specific navigation states.

Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow14Synchronizabl.name: Synchronizable
Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow14Synchronizabl.abstract: Provides a function to prevent concurrent block execution

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: dismissed
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx observable, triggered when the view is being dismissed

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: displayed
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx observable, triggered when the view appearance state changes

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: windowDidAppear
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx Single that is triggered once the UIWindow is displayed

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: willNavigate
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx Observable emitted before the navigation to a Step within a Flow

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: didNavigate
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx Observable emitted after the navigation to a Step within a Flow

Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.name: pausable(withPauser:)
Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.abstract: Pauses the elements of the source observable sequence based on the latest element from the second observable sequence.

Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.name: pausable(afterCount:withPauser:)
Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.abstract: Pauses the elements of the source observable sequence based on the latest element from the second observable sequence.

Enums/RxFlowStep.html#/s:6RxFlow0aB4Step.name: home
Enums/RxFlowStep.html#/s:6RxFlow0aB4Step.abstract: can be used to express a Flow first step

Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.name: multiple(flowContributors:)
Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.abstract: a Flow will trigger several FlowContributor at the same time for the same Step

Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.name: one(flowContributor:)
Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.abstract: a Flow will trigger only one FlowContributor for a Step

Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.name: end(forwardToParentFlowWithStep:)
Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.abstract: a Flow will trigger a special FlowContributor that represents the dismissal of this Flow

Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.name: none
Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.abstract: no further navigation will be triggered for a Step

Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.name: triggerParentFlow(withStep:)
Enums/FlowContributors.html#/s:6RxFlow0B.abstract: same as .one(flowContributor: .forwardToParentFlow(withStep: Step)). Should not be used anymore

Enums/FlowContributor.html#/s:6RxFlow0B1.name: contribute(withNextPresentable:withNextStepper:)
Enums/FlowContributor.html#/s:6RxFlow0B1.abstract: the given stepper will emit steps, according to lifecycle of the given presentable, that will contribute to the current Flow

Enums/FlowContributor.html#/s:6RxFlow0B1.name: forwardToCurrentFlow(withStep:)
Enums/FlowContributor.html#/s:6RxFlow0B1.abstract: the withStep step will be forwarded to the current flow

Enums/FlowContributor.html#/s:6RxFlow0B1.name: forwardToParentFlow(withStep:)
Enums/FlowContributor.html#/s:6RxFlow0B1.abstract: the withStep step will be forwarded to the parent flow

Enums/FlowContributor.html.name: FlowContributor
Enums/FlowContributor.html.abstract: A FlowContributor describes the next thing that will contribute to a Flow.

Enums/FlowContributors.html.name: FlowContributors
Enums/FlowContributors.html.abstract: FlowContributors reprent the next things that will trigger

Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.name: whenReady(flows:block:)
Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.abstract: Allow to be triggered only when Flows given as parameters are ready to be displayed.

Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.name: whenReady(flow1:flow2:flow3:flow4:flow5:block:)
Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.abstract: Allow to be triggered only when Flows given as parameters are ready to be displayed.

Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.name: whenReady(flow1:flow2:flow3:flow4:block:)
Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.abstract: Allow to be triggered only when Flows given as parameters are ready to be displayed.

Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.name: whenReady(flow1:flow2:flow3:block:)
Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.abstract: Allow to be triggered only when Flows given as parameters are ready to be displayed.

Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.name: whenReady(flow1:flow2:block:)
Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.abstract: Allow to be triggered only when Flows given as parameters are ready to be displayed.

Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.name: whenReady(flow1:block:)
Classes/Flows.html#/s:6RxFlow5FlowsC9whe.abstract: Allow to be triggered only when Flow given as parameters is ready to be displayed.

Classes/FlowCoordinator.html.name: FlowCoordinator
Classes/FlowCoordinator.html.abstract: A FlowCoordinator handles the navigation of a Flow, based on its Stepper and the FlowContributors it emits

Classes/OneStepper.html.name: OneStepper
Classes/OneStepper.html.abstract: A Simple Stepper that has one goal: emit a single Step once initialized

Classes/DefaultStepper.html.name: DefaultStepper
Classes/DefaultStepper.html.abstract: A Simple Stepper that has one goal: emit a first default step equal to RxFlowStep.home

Classes/CompositeStepper.html.name: CompositeStepper
Classes/CompositeStepper.html.abstract: A Stepper that combines multiple steppers. All those Steppers will be associated

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
